title: Web-Based Authentic Assessment System Design and Operation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Web-Based Learning Platform Fundamentals and Assessment Tool Utilization
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where current practitioners strengthen practical assessment tool development skills and conduct collaborative projects in BYOD settings.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more scenario-based assessment tools that simulate actual job situations
Learners can develop and improve evaluation rubrics incorporating peer and expert feedback
Learners can operate a process-oriented assessment (CBA) system utilizing online forums and real-time sessions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
